item.title: 14 Best Office Chairs of 2025— I've Tested 55+ to Pick Them
item.description: Sitting at a desk for hours? Upgrade your WFH setup and work in style with these comfy WIRED-tested seats.

item.title: How Candise Lin Became the Unofficial Ambassador of Chinese Internet Culture
item.description: Long before TikTok refugees discovered Red Note, Candise Lin was giving Americans a portal into the wild, hilarious world of Chinese social media.

item.title: This Modular Phone Concept Is Xiaomi’s Plan to Kill the Camera Bump
item.description: If you hate the big camera bump of today's smartphones, you'll love the detachable lens of Xiaomi’s Modular Optical System.

item.title: Lenovo's Latest Laptop Concept Has a Screen That Can Flip and Fold
item.description: At Mobile World Congress 2025, the company also teased a solar-powered laptop and an accessory that adds two extra screens to your portable PC.

item.title: Honor's New AI Agent Can Read and Understand Your Screen
item.description: The Honor UI Agent—powered by Google's Gemini 2 model—gives a glimpse of artificial intelligence agents on Android.
